description: Provide standardized access to comprehensive cryptocurrency market data, exchange information, and blockchain metrics. Fetch the latest crypto trends, market movements, and detailed OHLCV data with type-safe parameter validation. Empower your applications with reliable and up-to-date crypto insights through a unified interface.

capabilities.name: cryptoCategories
capabilities.description: Returns information about all coin categories available on CoinMarketCap.

capabilities.name: cryptoCategory
capabilities.description: Returns information about a single coin category on CoinMarketCap.

capabilities.name: cryptoCurrencyMap
capabilities.description: Returns a mapping of all cryptocurrencies to unique CoinMarketCap IDs.

capabilities.name: getCryptoMetadata
capabilities.description: Returns all static metadata for one or more cryptocurrencies including logo, description, and website URLs.

capabilities.name: allCryptocurrencyListings
capabilities.description: Returns a paginated list of all active cryptocurrencies with latest market data.

capabilities.name: cryptoQuotesLatest
capabilities.description: Returns the latest market quote for one or more cryptocurrencies.

capabilities.name: dexInfo
capabilities.description: Returns all static metadata for one or more decentralised exchanges.

capabilities.name: dexListingsLatest
capabilities.description: Returns a paginated list of all decentralised cryptocurrency exchanges including the latest aggregate market data.

capabilities.name: dexNetworksList
capabilities.description: Returns a list of all networks to unique CoinMarketCap ids.

capabilities.name: dexSpotPairsLatest
capabilities.description: Returns a paginated list of all active dex spot pairs with latest market data.

capabilities.name: dexPairsQuotesLatest
capabilities.description: Returns the latest market quote for 1 or more spot pairs.

capabilities.name: dexPairsOhlcvLatest
capabilities.description: Returns the latest OHLCV market values for one or more spot pairs for the current UTC day.

capabilities.name: dexPairsOhlcvHistorical
capabilities.description: Returns historical OHLCV data along with market cap for any spot pairs using time interval parameters.

capabilities.name: dexPairsTradeLatest
capabilities.description: Returns up to the latest 100 trades for 1 spot pair.

capabilities.name: exchangeAssets
capabilities.description: Returns the assets/token holdings of an exchange.

capabilities.name: exchangeInfo
capabilities.description: Returns metadata for one or more exchanges.

capabilities.name: exchangeMap
capabilities.description: Returns a mapping of all exchanges to unique CoinMarketCap IDs.

capabilities.name: globalMetricsLatest
capabilities.description: Returns the latest global cryptocurrency market metrics.

capabilities.name: cmc100IndexHistorical
capabilities.description: Returns an interval of historic CoinMarketCap 100 Index values based on the interval parameter.

capabilities.name: cmc100IndexLatest
capabilities.description: Returns the lastest CoinMarketCap 100 Index value, constituents, and constituent weights.

capabilities.name: fearAndGreedLatest
capabilities.description: Returns the latest CMC Crypto Fear and Greed Index value.

capabilities.name: fearAndGreedHistorical
capabilities.description: Returns historical CMC Crypto Fear and Greed Index values.

capabilities.name: fiatMap
capabilities.description: Returns a mapping of all supported fiat currencies to unique CoinMarketCap IDs.

capabilities.name: getPostmanCollection
capabilities.description: Returns a Postman collection for the CoinMarketCap API.

capabilities.name: priceConversion
capabilities.description: Convert an amount of one cryptocurrency or fiat currency into one or more different currencies.

capabilities.name: keyInfo
capabilities.description: Returns API key details and usage stats.
